channel.title: MASKS: Generation Xtra
channel.description:
Generation Xtra
A MASKS game about being a super star and a super hero all in one. This TV based team will tear up the world (maybe literally) in their search for fame and justice. Just hope the villains don't become recurring!
1 pm CDT Wednesdays in May/ 6 pm BST
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_drPQu_d_1Be-kU-8C
Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_drjyreAdG9myk2uG_
Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_ds2KGBh7iPFTZMEmi
Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_dsFcJyHcExHIVrl5E
Session 5: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-L_dsSWz3zVHD9bquX4l

item.title: MASKS: Generation Xtra
item.dc:creator: @Ferret
item.description:
@Ferret wrote:

Here is my current lineup!

Banned Playbooks: Core – None

Halcyon – The Innocent

Aegis - The Soldier

Unbound - All

So, those allowed are: Beacon, Bull, Delinquent, Doomed, Janus, Legacy, Nova, Outsider, Protege, Transformed, Reformed, Newborn, Star, Joined, and Brain!

Read full topic

item.title: MASKS: Generation Xtra
item.dc:creator: @Will_H
item.description:
@Will_H wrote:

I’ve signed up for Session 2+ and I’m on the waitlist for 1, but please do let me know if someone from session 1 who isn’t through to the rest wants in - happy to be bumped or just be a ‘special guest star’ in one or two sessions Mainly just want to try Masks out.

Playbooks from the main game only or any extras allowed?

Read full topic
